title: Release NuGet package 1.59.2 with fixes
body: I'm using SkiaSharp.Extended.Svg to load and render SVG images. I stumbled upon the error "For security reasons DTD is prohibited in this XML document", which was already fixed by pull request #17. Can we have an updated NuGet package (there is already a milestoe 1.59.2 with no open issues)? Thank you!
